StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to write.

IntVectorProperty.name: LastFrame
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Last frame to save (included). If the stride is set different than 1, is is possible that the effective last frame number will be inferior. Negative indexes work similarily to Python list indexes (so -1 is last frame).

IntVectorProperty.name: FrameStride
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: One frame every "stride" frame will be saved. Useful to generate faster, ligher LAS for testing.

IntVectorProperty.name: ExportType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: What type of export should be done?

IntVectorProperty.name: InOutSignedUTMZone
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: UTM zone used for input and output. 1 to 60: Northern hemisphere UTM zones -60 to -1: Southern hemisphere UTM zones (-n means "UTM zone n, South")

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Offset
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Offset to apply to the points in order to find their position inside the provided UTM Zone. Also used as origin for writing the LAS File (this offset is written in the header and is not applied to the points).

IntVectorProperty.name: SkipMetaDataPass
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If enabled, only one pass is done which can provides a significant speedup. In this case the axis aligned bounding box of all points will be set to (0.0, 0.0, 0.0) to (0.0, 0.0, 0.0) (which is incorrect).

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteSRS
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should the SRS (Spatial Reference System) information be written in the LAS file ? If you do not know, leave to true.

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteColor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should the RGB color (if available) be written in the LAS file ? Resulting LAS will be bigger.
